name: Castor
description:
Made by students in cooperation with Blekingearkivet in Bräkne-Hoby.

Explore the ship "S/S Castor", meet the crew and learn about life at sea in the 1930's in this singleplayer side-scroller!

CREDITS:

Programming: Sebastian Lund & Johan Nauclér Löfving

Environment Art: Sondre Huhtala (ShorePlain)

Dialogue/Audio/Trailer:  Andréas Isaksson

Character Art/Character Animation/Trailer: Elin Carlström
